1.title: Apprenticeships: Return on Investment Tool
1.category: A project I did at work
1.description: A tool for employers (that could potentially hire apprentices) to calculate their return on investment on hiring and training an apprentice.
deliverables: Contributing to the Department for Education's official goals for Apprenticeships which are to be achieved by 2025.

2.title: Apprenticeships: Notification Settings
2.category: A project I did at work
2.description: A tool placed within the apprentice's account for them to set their preferences on which notifications they'd like to recieve and which notifications they do not want to recieve from the Apprenticeship Service.

3.title: My Portfolio
3.description: A website I built as my personal portfolio to showcase my work.
